title: How to Clean a Mattress
summary: Using baking soda to freshen and clean a mattress.
content: To clean a mattress using baking soda, remove all bedding and sprinkle a generous amount of baking soda over the entire surface of the mattress. Let the baking soda sit for at least 30 minutes to absorb odors and moisture. Afterward, vacuum the mattress thoroughly to remove the baking soda and any dirt or debris.
